response.original_title: ALTERNATE REALITY: Booker T & the Reality of Wrestling
response.overview: "ALTERNATE REALITY: Booker T & the Reality of Wrestling” follows WWE Hall of Famer Booker T as he leads his Houston-based wrestling school and promotion, Reality of Wrestling. At the heart of the story is Gaspar Hernandez—Booker’s newest mentee and personal project—rising through the ranks under his watchful eye. With ROW head trainer Ryan Davidson in his corner, Booker reflects on legacy, mentorship, and whether it’s time for one final return to the ring.
response.title: ALTERNATE REALITY: Booker T & the Reality of Wrestling
